fields.name: ba_ref
fields.title: Billing reference
fields.description: Unique code for a specific hereditament. May be multiple rows for history.

fields.name: prop_ba_rates
fields.title: Property billing rates
fields.description: Actual rates paid by a specific ratepayer.

fields.name: postcode
fields.title: Postcode
fields.description: Full address or postcode of ratepayer.

fields.name: occupation_state_date
fields.title: Date of occupation state
fields.description: Date of the start of status in occupation_state.

fields.name: occupation_state_reliefs
fields.title: Occupation state reliefs
fields.description: Array of the categories of reliefs / exemptions applied.
